item.title: IPv4 Subnet Mask Cheat Sheet
item.description: A quick overview “cheat sheet” of IPv4 Subnet masks.. This comes in surprisingly handy more often than I first imagined it would. Addresses Hosts Netmask Amount of a Class Class /30 4 2 255.255.255.252 1/64 C /29 8 6 255.255.255.248 1/32 C /28 16 14 255.255.255.240 1/16 C /27 32 30 255.255.255.224 1/8 C /26 64 62 255.
